text: Yes I can! It works for me with and without vterm. So here's what I did. I opened up a .jl file to get Julia major mode. I did C-c C-c to open up a Julia REPL. Then when I typed in the Julia REPL I used it like normal. You might need to get into Insert Mode to make sure that you're typing into the Julia REPL so that it activates the package repl mode with ]
